questions.question: Which AWS service is used for object storage?
What is the main benefit of using Auto Scaling in AWS?
answers: Automatically adjusts the number of EC2 instances
questions.correct: Automatically adjusts the number of EC2 instances

questions.question: Which AWS service provides a managed relational database?
Which AWS feature allows you to define infrastructure as code?

answers: Isolate resources in a virtual network
questions.correct: Isolate resources in a virtual network

questions.question: Which AWS service provides a content delivery network (CDN)?
A public–facing three–tier app: EC2 in private subnets need internet for patches but no public access. Which two actions accomplish this?
answers: Configure a NAT gateway in a public subnet
Associate Elastic IP addresses to the EC2 instances
Define a custom route table with a route to the internet gateway for private subnets
Define a custom route table with a route to the NAT gateway for private subnets
correct: Configure a NAT gateway in a public subnet

questions.question: Which feature allows EC2 instances to retain memory contents across a 2–week shutdown?
answers: Storing data on instance store volumes

questions.question: To reroute traffic to a standby EC2 using private IPv4, what's the solution?
answers: Use DHCP to assign same IP
Attach a secondary ENI with the private IP and move the ENI across instances
questions.correct: Attach a secondary ENI with the private IP and move the ENI across instances

questions.question: How can a JavaScript script on a webpage make authenticated GET requests to S3 successfully?
answers: Enable CORS on the S3 bucket
Allow public execute in bucket policy
questions.correct: Enable CORS on the S3 bucket

questions.question: Which encryption options support encrypting data at rest using keys stored only on–premises? (Select TWO)
answers: Use Auto Scaling group behind ALB
